catalog_info.title: Dreams and the Dreaming
catalog_info.notes: Additional hour to be arranged. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3315b. This course can be taken either as the second half of a year-long sequence, or as a single-semester, stand-alone course.
catalog_info.description: A continuation of Dreams and the Dreaming. We will evaluate current research in the psychology and neurobiology of dreams with respect to relevance for the religious and spiritual dimensions of human dreaming. Focus is on Eastern, Native American, and Australian aboriginal traditions.
